text: Feuerschützenbostel is a hamlet in the town of Bergen in North Germany that belongs to the parish of Eversen. It is 2.5 km west of Eversen. == Sources == *Franz Rathmann: Dorfbuch Eversen. Ein Haus- und Lesebuch, 1998. == Other websites == *Website of Rittergut Feuerschützenbostel Category:Celle (district) Category:Villages in Lower Saxony Category:Bergen, Lower Saxony
title: Feuerschützenbostel
